verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to give the more earnest heed <S%G4337><s%> <S%G4056><s%> to the things which we have heard, <S%G191><s%> lest at any time <S%G3379><s%> we should let them slip. <S%G3901><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> spoken <S%G2980><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> steadfast, <S%G949><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> transgression <S%G3847><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> disobedience <S%G3876><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> a just <S%G1738><s%> recompense of reward; <S%G3405><s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> shall we <S%G2249><s%> escape, <S%G1628><s%> if we neglect <S%G272><s%> so great <S%G5082><s%> salvation; <S%G4991><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> at the first began <S%G2983><s%> <S%G746><s%> to be spoken <S%G2980><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was confirmed <S%G950><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> them that heard <S%G191><s%> him;

God <S%G2316><s%> also bearing them witness, <S%G4901><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> with signs <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wonders, <S%G5059><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with divers <S%G4164><s%> miracles, <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gifts <S%G3311><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his own <S%G848><s%> will? <S%G2308><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> unto the angels <S%G32><s%> hath he not <S%G3756><s%> put in subjection <S%G5293><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G3625><s%> to come, <S%G3195><s%> whereof <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3739><s%> we speak. <S%G2980><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> in a certain place <S%G4225><s%> testified, <S%G1263><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou art mindful <S%G3403><s%> of him? <S%G846><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou visitest <S%G1980><s%> him? <S%G846><s%>

Thou madest <S%G1642><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a little lower <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1024><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the angels; <S%G32><s%> thou crownedst <S%G4737><s%> him <S%G846><s%> with glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> didst set <S%G2525><s%> him <S%G846><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> hands: <S%G5495><s%>

Thou hast put all things in subjection <S%G5293><s%> <S%G3956><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet. <S%G4228><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> in that he put all in subjection under <S%G5293><s%> <S%G3956><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> he left <S%G863><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> that is not put under <S%G506><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> we see <S%G3708><s%> not yet <S%G3768><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> put under <S%G5293><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> we see <S%G991><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who was made a little lower <S%G1642><s%> <S%G1024><s%> <S%G5100><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> suffering <S%G3804><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> crowned <S%G4737><s%> with glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honor; <S%G5092><s%> that <S%G3704><s%> he by the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should taste <S%G1089><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> every man. <S%G3956><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it became <S%G4241><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things, <S%G3956><s%> in bringing <S%G71><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%> to make the captain of their salvation perfect <S%G5048><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G747><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4991><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> sufferings. <S%G3804><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> he that sanctifieth <S%G37><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they who are sanctified <S%G37><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> one: <S%G1520><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> cause <S%G156><s%> he is not <S%G3756><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> them <S%G846><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> I will declare <S%G518><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> unto my <S%G3450><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> will I sing praise <S%G5214><s%> unto thee. <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will put my trust <S%G2071><s%> <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> Behold <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> children <S%G3813><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> me. <S%G3427><s%>

Forasmuch <S%G1893><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> as the <S%G3588><s%> children <S%G3813><s%> are partakers <S%G2841><s%> of flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> he <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> himself likewise <S%G3898><s%> took part <S%G3348><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> same; <S%G846><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> he might destroy <S%G2673><s%> him that had <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> power <S%G2904><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> that is, <S%G5123><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devil; <S%G1228><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> deliver <S%G525><s%> them <S%G5128><s%> who <S%G3745><s%> through fear <S%G5401><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> their <S%G1223><s%> lifetime <S%G2198><s%> subject to <S%G1777><s%> bondage. <S%G1397><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> verily <S%G1222><s%> he took not on <S%G1949><s%> <S%G3756><s%> him the nature of angels; <S%G32><s%> but <S%G235><s%> he took on <S%G1949><s%> him the seed <S%G4690><s%> of Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

Wherefore <S%G3606><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> it behooved <S%G3784><s%> him to be made like unto <S%G3666><s%> his brethren, <S%G80><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might be <S%G1096><s%> a merciful <S%G1655><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%> in things <S%G4314><s%> pertaining to God, <S%G2316><s%> to make reconciliation for <S%G2433><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G846><s%> himself hath suffered <S%G3958><s%> being tempted, <S%G3985><s%> he is able <S%G1410><s%> to succor <S%G997><s%> them that are tempted. <S%G3985><s%>
